Threat: Employees: intentional or accidental mistake in Ansible configuration files
Countermeasure: Automated configuration can be tested on accurate local mirror of the instance which is created using Vagrant
Additional Countermeasures: Monitor changes to the configuration files, enforce reviews of substantial changes.

Threat: Skilled Hacker, Malware: encrypt configuration files, demand ransom
Countermeasure: Specially hardened server, firewall, configuration files are backed up and stored in a remote git repository
